summary: Adventures of Ivan the Fool and humpbacked horse in the world of kind magical creatures and cruel people.
cast: Georgi Chernovolenko|Alik Kachanov|Anatoliy Kubatskiy|Georgiy Millyar|Galina Novozhilova|Leonid Pirogov|Valentina Sperantova|Georgiy Vitsin|Nonna Yastrebova

title: El caballo mágico
